name: Type 0
desc: Considered the baseline, no notable power

name: Type Blue
desc: Have limited, subconscious manipulation of probability, usually as a result of superstition

name: Type Green
tagline: Extraordinary reality bending in the present
desc: Extraordinary control, conscious or unconscious, able to bend the present reality

name: Type Yellow
tagline: Limited ability to manipulate immediate/distant future
desc: Able to manipulate either the immediate moment or the distant future with limited effect

name: Type Orange
tagline: Absolute control over present and future reality
desc: Able to manipulate the present and future with absolute control

name: Type Red
tagline: Absolute control of past, present, and future reality
desc: Able to manipulate the past in any capacity
